message: I have done some work reviewing talks and tutorials, it looks to be an outstanding group of presenters covering a huge range of topics.
I have not been before anything I should know?
The best tip I can think of is: bring your stamina! It gets exhausting after 5 days of geeking, learning and partying!
So my talk got accepted. I get a bunch of passes to random things I don't know anything about. What of the events should I go to?
I'll be wanting to work that week, so I'll probably just selectively hit up events
If Stonehenge give their usual party that should be worth attending. Randall Schartz can be very entertaining, and the booze flows fairly freely (warning: it's three years since I was at OSCON).
@ericholscher the web site will go live tomorrow, you'll have plenty time to decide what you want to see. OSCON is *huge*, so it all depends on your interests. And, glad you'll be talking!
wow. price is something on the order or 2-3x what I was expecting.
